website_summaries.verdict: Novel inside-out folding umbrella keeps water from dripping all over.
cons: Some users report metal tips falling off

customer_reviews.title: YOU DON’T GET WET WHEN GETTING IN THE CAR!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this umbrella! I purchased one earlier for myself and loved it so much that I purchased 3 more, one for each of my daughters and one for my granddaughter! This is the greatest invention in years! It is wonderful to be able to get into the car and close your umbrella and then bring it inside without getting drenched! This is a great product that is sturdy and fashionable!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Gillaspie

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this umbrella once and the top canvase is coming off Already. How can they say It's wind proof If it can't even be opened once without breaking?
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Thomaier

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy One...BUY THREE!
customer_reviews.text: I was initially attracted to these umbrellas because of their striking appearance. They’re also very sturdy, and easy to open and close. People frequently ask where I got mine and express a desire to get one, too. The only downside is the variety of designs...It’s impossible to choose! Once you have one, guarantee you’ll want more!! Great gift item, especially since most people have never seen an umbrella like this. They’re unusual, useful, and affordable. What could be better? Other benefits: No need to lean them against the wall because they stand upright independently. You can hook the C-shaped handle over your wrist and still have both hands free for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect when you're running a lot of errands in your car in the rain!
customer_reviews.text: The design of this umbrella is SO GENIUS! I don't know how many times it has saved me when running back and forth to different work locations in the rain, not having to drag a dripping umbrella across me when I get in and out of the car! I also love that it can stand up on its own and drip dry. I appreciate the C handle, but I'm not 100% convinced I like it better than a regular hook or U. The flower pattern is beautiful and incorporates my favorite colors. This umbrella gets me compliments and astonished looks every time I use it!
customer_reviews.author: PancakesMajor

customer_reviews.title: Great Design and Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is great. Vibrant colors. I ordered the red with black and white stripes on the opposite side. The design is fantastic and it makes so much more sense when entering and exiting a vehicle over the traditional designed umbrella. I will say, I had an issue with the first umbrella I ordered from Bagail. The handle had an internal manufacturing defect that caused it to break when it slid down the wall where it had been propped up and hit the wood floor. I contacted customer service at Bagail and they had me send photos and then agreed to replace it. No issues and prompt correspondence. Thanks again Bagail!
customer_reviews.author: Texas Alejandro

customer_reviews.title: Does not work properly!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Cute umbrella and great concept! But does not work properly! Will not lock into “open” when needed... very disappointing as I debated about this purchase for a while after reading the reviews... most of the time I am pleasantly surprised with my purchases after reading reviews... this time that was NOT the case! Listen to the reviews... save your money... not worth the purchase price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The umbrella did not disappoint. It has venting so the wind did not ...
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella arrived as expected. The first time I used it, it was a very windy day and I hesitated to put it for fear it would get ruined. The umbrella did not disappoint. It has venting so the wind did not toss it about as I have experienced with other umbrellas. I love the handle so I can hold it on my wrist. My only wish is that when it folded up, it was small enough to put in a tote bag or purse. It's still fairly long when collapsed. Would totally recommend! Great purchase that makes the rainy grey days happier!
customer_reviews.author: KZ

customer_reviews.title: Defective umbrella
customer_reviews.text: We had our first big rain since I bought this umbrella. I haven’t had a chance to use it. I was shocked to find out that it doesn’t stay open on its own. I had to hold it open at the top. Maybe mine is defective? :( It’s a beautiful umbrella. I love the colors
customer_reviews.author: RG

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. Works really well and great quality. The colors are bright too
customer_reviews.author: MomOf3

customer_reviews.title: Its Pretty...  but...
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is very pretty and seems ok as far as stuffiness. My issue is that they punched out a ton of micro holes in the under layer (the pic layer) to say the companies name like 10 times. Since its reversible when you close it these "holes" are on the outside. I'm afraid at some point they will get snagged on something and tear. Just not sure.. I love the style but I'm gonna look at other brands that don't do this.
customer_reviews.author: Dee J.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: Umbrella arrived on-time and well-packaged. It's super-sturdy, as I would expect considering it's about triple the price of what you'd get from Wally. I'm a teacher and I go out on recess duty regularly and this umbrella has held up to all the North Idaho conditions, no problem! I like the design because when the umbrella is soaking wet you can close it pointed in the opposite direction of yourself and you don't get dripped on!
customer_reviews.author: ELO

customer_reviews.title: Would NOT close!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Omg the worst umbrella!!! I stood outside in the pouring rain forever trying to close it and it was stuck and would NOT for the life of me CLOSE!!!!! Got myself and my car all wet. Finally had the just forcibly shove the whole thing into my trunk and now I have to figure out how to dispose of it. Never again. Beware. SO regret buying this thing.
customer_reviews.author: V. Lo

customer_reviews.title: Nice size will accommodate two people
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The umbrella construction is first rate. Double layer ensures no rain will get through. Nice size will accommodate two people. Perfect for when you are trying to get out of your car and don't want to get drenched before you can get your umbrella open. Various under-brella design choice is a nice touch. Cons: Handle is a bit of an odd design and will take some getting used to. Would be nice to have an automatic open function button.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Loved it but it broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: I loved this umbrella and got compliments on it. However, I only used it about 5 times prior, and as it's raining in Boston today, I went to use it, and upon opening a piece of metal pierced through the fabric. I'm unfortunately two weeks outside the return window, but would love a company representative to contact me. A replacement would make a very happy repeat customer and I would happily edit to 5 stars. Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren LeClair

customer_reviews.title: Good Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: My first umbrella was horrible. It looked like it would be good quality upon receiving. the shaft of the umbrella is plastic. It would not close correctly with the first use. Broke after the second use. **UPDATED*** After posting this review the Bagail Company reach out to me to replace my umbrella. I am thinking my first one was defective. My new one I have had zero issue with it. It open ans closes perfectly without a struggle. I appreciate the company wanting to fix the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Ami J.

customer_reviews.title: Unique
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is different from what you're used to. It has worked VERY well in the rain and is a great size for one person. The handle is well made and easy to grip and hold. It also has an easy open button making this product easy to use. There is no sharp point at the end of the umbrella like your typical golf umbrella making it more safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amber M

customer_reviews.title: Next generation umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Saw this umbrella on one of the home shopping sites and found it here less expensive. The design is fantastic - no wire rods to catch in your hair or pinch your fingers. The rain is nicely kept inside the folded umbrella to keep your car dry. Just set it upside down to dry! The pretty flower is only on the inside, but pretty nonetheless. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper1972

customer_reviews.title: Broke after minimal use!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it at first but less than a year of using it occasionally, one of the spokes broke and when I tried to get it to open it pushed through the inside layer and left a big slice in it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Timeless49

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE the Inverted Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the Inverted Umbrella! I've only used it twice since I bought it and have already had people stop and ask me where I got it. I love that the colored print is on the inside and love the overall design of the umbrella. I find the handle very comfortable, which I can fit over my wrist for the convenience of carrying other items, and it's so convenient to hang on a coat hook without getting the wall or other coats wet. Extremely convenient for getting in and out of a car and staying perfectly dry. THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sitting outside on a hot day
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this umbrella after our church decided to hold services outside this summer during the pandemic. Sitting in full sun with temps in the 90's, I found it to be very comfortable sitting under this umbrella. I am typically bothered by heat and my husband not so much. The first Sunday that I used this umbrella I was cooler than he was using a regular umbrella during the service. Temps were in the 90's that day. The handle works pretty well. I like that I can have both hands free while sitting in my chair and holding my Kindle. I am really happy with this umbrella and recommend it to others. Love all the choices in design.
customer_reviews.author: Colonial Girl

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I am no longer sprinkled with water droplets when I close the umbrella and it is perfect for getting in and out of the car! everyone should buy one!
customer_reviews.author: Dana H.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Handle area is large and easier than a straight stick handle. Opens and closes smoothly. Sunflower pattern is stylish and looks good with most work outfits but the yellow closed up is just enough to see in a dark interior car when you’re in a hurry. I bought a different style from a different vendor and that one came with a sleeve to put on it when closed up. It would’ve been nice if this vendor included that too as I use the sleeve more than I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Queen_bee

customer_reviews.title: There's a naked lady in here!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the Beautiful Ladies pattern. The demo picture does not reveal that the print features two intertwined ladies, one dressed, one stark naked. Yep, you can shelter under her fully detailed Monty, so to speak. It took my husband to alert me to this. I actually didn't notice and went out with the umbrella open a few times. Gotta get in to the eye doctor... Knocked off two stars because they should have alerted buyers to the X rating, which could cause social or professional repercussions for some people.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Stockholder

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting to try one of these umbrellas for awhile, and when my last regular umbrella started leaking, I bought this one. This umbrella is affordable. It is easy to carry when it folded or open. I walk about .25 miles from my car to my office, each way, and I need a reliable umbrella, one that will stand up to some wind since I work in a downtown area that seems to be breezier than other places. I love the handle because I can hang it on my coat rack.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Not working after a few uses!
customer_reviews.text: It was a beautiful design and worked great the first 2 or 3 times I opened it. After that the button doesn’t work great and I had to play with it several times to get it to even stay open. Not convenient with a toddler and handful of other items! I contacted the seller and the response was “we don’t normally have this problem, are you putting too much pressure on the button?” No offer to fix it or replace. Terribly disappointed. Won’t be buying this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pena

customer_reviews.title: Surprised! These are pretty great!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t really expect quality or long-term functionality because I got the sunflower/ van Gogh one at such a LOW price- ($13 ish at the time?) and only because I’m an art teacher and wanted it for classroom use/ online learning background. I was so pleasantly surprised to find it pretty sturdy, and the design keeps the inside of my car dry after using it in the rain. I’m impressed. 👍 Buying more for an upcoming gift exchange- really cute designs.
customer_reviews.author: S.Marie

customer_reviews.title: Arrived dirty!!
customer_reviews.text: Not only was this very small and kind of flat. Doesn't close in around you. Most importantly, my umbrella is covered in stains that look like mud or poop! Looks like someone stepped on it!! Just received this today. Not happy at all!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Saucedo

customer_reviews.title: Handle Seems Awkward
customer_reviews.text: I really haven't had a chance to use this umbrella yet. Actually, I have been a little intimidated by it and have not wanted to use it. The handle seems to be exceedingly awkward, so I always grab my old umbrella and the inverted umbrella is also rather heavy to carry. Will try to use it soon because it is just wasted money sitting in my closet. Bottom line is that initially, I have not been thrilled with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Neil

customer_reviews.title: Umbrella Leaks - Very Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Although this umbrella was smaller than another brand I previously ordered, I liked the design and it seemed to work the way it was supposed to. However, about 3 months ago, I noticed a puddle on the floor when I picked up the umbrella. I realized the access rain water sitting in the umbrella apparently leaked. About a week ago, my clothes got all wet while holding the umbrella upright (while inverted) against me and my clothes got all wet. I realized it was leaking down the handle and through the netted covering. I am very disappointed that this happened but am glad it happened before I placed my order for 6 more to give as Christmas gifts this year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun but a lot of material when closed ..
customer_reviews.text: I have mixed feelings about this umbrella. First of all I love the color and concept. I always wanted to buy one like this ...however the two things I didn’t love was that it wouldn’t open all the way from first try and when you close it it had too much material. It may work for some people and again concept is great but it’s a bit messy for me - I need small umbrella to go from car to office.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper123

customer_reviews.title: ???? NOT WORTH THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this umbrella in January. Believe it or not, I opened it and placed in in the back seat of my car and left it. I have several umbrellas to chose from so it had not been used. Raised it to see what it looked like and put it back. March 25, raining like cats and dogs, hubby pulled the umbrella out to use it, raised it and went to close it and it would NOT close!!! Damn thing is stuck OPEN!!! Oh well, guess i'm stuck with this garbage. Too late to return....trash it goes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I actually had bought the "Branded" type of this umbrella and I loved it. However I lost the umbrella and didn't want to spend that type of money on a new one. With that said I bought this umbrella was really excited about all the colors and prints it came in. I took a chance and bought 3 different patterns of this same umbrella 1 for myself and the others for my daughters. Have to tell you can't tell the difference from the more expensive brand I originally bought as far as quality. But big difference in price and the ones I bought are so much prettier!
customer_reviews.author: Janbo

customer_reviews.title: FUN Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: While I got this mainly for sun protection, it is a cool design for rain. The way it closes in reverse keeps the water from running into your car or your home or wherever you are. Love how many colors and styles they have. It's nice and big and well made and designed. My only criticism is that the handle is kind of wonky and gets hard to hold after a bit. Other than that - it's a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Utopiac

customer_reviews.title: I love this umbrella
customer_reviews.text: It opens easily, it closes easily and you don't get wet getting into the car. Another bonus, is that the inside of the car doesn't get wet with a dripping umbrella. It has a little cloth carrying case that I haven't used yet. Oh yes, it is beautiful.....black on the top and beautiful roses on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Argyle 8

customer_reviews.title: It works fine. Don't buy if you aren't sure you want to carry around a large umbrella
customer_reviews.text: It works. Not as special or great as I expected. I find that I prefer the smaller collapsible umbrella that I bought at the same time. There is nothing wrong with this umbrella - it's just large and unwieldy to carry around and I don't enjoy that as much as I had thought. Side note: as someone who studies credibility online for my dissertation, I also wonder whether all of the previous reviews were legitimate or not.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia M

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Design and Great Coverage
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant to order one of these because I am old-fashion and thought they looked funny. I finally decided to get one after listening to my sister. I am in love! It keeps the water from getting all in my car after getting in from the rain. It is super easy to operate too! The design I got was an added bonus. I highly recommend this umbrella.i am hooked on this umbrella! If you are like I was and on the fence, go ahead and GET IT!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Eastridge

customer_reviews.title: Unfair Advertising
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to get the umbrella. I had planned to give some as Christmas presents until l saw your name created with pinhole sized dots. I would never have purchased the umbrella if I had been aware of this feature. I did not see this before hand and think it was very deceptively done. If all of them have this design feature it should be clearly stated.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this however on my 2nd use I go to put it up and guess what the thing will not go up smoothly it feels like metal sticks poles whatever it is in a umbrella gets off track and I have to try 4-5 times putting it up and down before it will catch and open. I am really disappointed in this item if it was cheaper I would over look it but it’s a pain to use
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this umberella because it seems it would make your life easier. Although, the idea of it is brilliant it is not very well thought. The material which the umberella holder is made of is very fragile. When I received it it was already broken just from it being delivered. I am a little glad it broke then and not when I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: paulina casillas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Bought this during a period of torrential rain in SETX, and I was tired of being drenched pulling my regular umbrella inside of my car...I had my eye on these for years when I first saw them on QVC...but, thought they were too expensive! Luckily they were at a very affordable price...but, there has been NO RAIN, since this purchase...go figure!
customer_reviews.author: adrb1tx

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality stitching
customer_reviews.text: When I pulled the umbrella out of the box 1 tip was loose. Two anchor points for the inside canopy were loose. I repaired it. I've used it on my daily walks for about 3 weeks. Two more tips came loose. I repaired these as well. I like the umbrella's utility and it's overall quality. If the stitching had not been a problem, I would have given this 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: LINDA

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay closed resulting in it dripping water. Doesn't work as described.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one in 2018 and loved it. I lost it and bought a new one from the same brand and it's not as good. It won't stay closed. When I close it, it "clicks" in place like its closed but without pressing the open button it slides open. It's really frustrating because when I try to put the umbrella across my lap to get it in the car it opens slightly dripping water all over me. Defeats the whole purpose of it being inverted I get wet.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had the umbrella a month and it’s already broken. We are having very bad rain storms here in Georgia. I take the umbrella out, try to open it and it won’t stay opened. It’s not locking in the open state. I had to use rubber hair ties to form a knot to keep it open. I had an inverted umbrella from another company but I lost it on an overseas trip. This is very poorly made
customer_reviews.author: jackie

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality. Pay more money for a better umbrella.
customer_reviews.text: It is not a sturdy umbrella. Spend more money and get a different brand. The umbrella doesn't even open after 4 times of use. Now I am past the return window. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Works Like it Should
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and high quality. My mom was so jealous that she bought her own lol. I haven't used it in the rain but the quality is so good I don't doubt it'll work great. I use mine to shade me from the sun,because I'm allergic, and it works beautifully. It's nice and large so it covers all of me, and its lightweight enough that I don't have problems holding it for long periods of time. Will our chase again.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B Robison

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: This was supposed to be a gift but after seeing the picture inside the umbrella we had to send t back. We will not walk around with two naked ladies!! Lol but the umbrella itself was sturdy and looks like it will hold up to strong winds. So just returned his one and ordered a more appropriate display on the umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Can’t go anywhere without being stopped!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two (polka dots and London scene). Whenever people see them, they’re asking where to get theirs. It’s crazy how a simple tool that most of us have can create so much chatter. As a tool, it works and serves its purpose. The best thing??? No more fighting with an umbrella to get in and out of the car on torrential rainfall days!
customer_reviews.author: S. Martin

customer_reviews.title: No hassle and dry start to finish!
customer_reviews.text: I started a new job that requires you to park a good walking distance to the building. I have been wanting one of these for quite some time, so I finally bought one. The day after I received it, it was raining pretty good. I opened my car door just a little, slipped it thru the opening and opened it and I was immediately covered leaving the car. It is the best umbrella I have ever used! I usually just wear my jacket with a hat short distances. I am so glad I finally ordered this. So very happy. I want to order more for family and friends.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Best Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Love this umbrella! I get many compliments on it. Great for sun because of the UV protection, and great for rain because of the reverse closure. Having the umbrella collapse in the opposite direction just makes so much sense. Why didn't someone think of this before? I appreciate that the handle is a loop that you can slip your wrist through. Makes carrying it much easier, and frees your hand if necessary by resting it against your shoulder with wrist through the loop. Liked it so much that I bought another for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Lady DJ

customer_reviews.title: YAY!!! IM DRY IN THE RAIN and WIND!!!
customer_reviews.text: YIPPEE!!! It's raining and windy and I am dry! Umbrella works good. I use it to walk to work. It's perfect in the wind. It stays put. Doesn't turn inside out when super windy! The water collects so you can just pour it out instead of getting the floor slippery and wet! Great purchase! Colors are beautiful as well!!
customer_reviews.author: barbara i.

customer_reviews.title: Upside Down
customer_reviews.text: Had the product for almost a year and have used multiple times in the rain. Umbrella has held up so far but has not been used in rain that had strong winds. Provides decent amount of protection. Great that it is reversed technology as it doesn't get the car as wet as normal umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Sk8brd

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Easy Open/Close
customer_reviews.text: For once, a sturdy easy open/close umbrella with a perfect canopy. Not too large, but large enough to cover you and whatever you may be carrying. When it is closed, it has a unique inside color of your choice. The C-shaped handle is super handy for hanging to dry or slip on your wrist for hands free carrying other things. When people saw it at work, everyone wanted one!
customer_reviews.author: azalora

customer_reviews.title: so far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this umbrella as a gift so I'm basing my review upon receiving the umbrella and checking it out before giving it away. So far, it seems like a very durable umbrella. The packaging was nice - it came wrapped in plastic and styrofoam so it was protected in shipment. I love the ease of opening/closing, and the colors are very vibrant. I purchased the red and blue/polka dots. It's super cute! Let's hope it holds up - it seems like it will.
customer_reviews.author: sv_in_Nashville

customer_reviews.title: Love the concept - came with a defect
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with an apparent defect and so one of the prongs has broken at the tip after just 1 use. Otherwise, it's a cute umbrella and I like the concept. It is definitely bigger than a basic umbrella. I probably would not buy again since it was broken. It's not fixable, cloth is sewn incorrectly and the tip is actually broken. Bummed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sexton

customer_reviews.title: The real deal!
customer_reviews.text: I love this umbrella! I use it mostly to seek cover from the sun on walks, but it's solid for rainy weather too. It even handles windy weather (within reason) well. Only issue I have is holding on to it when multitasking -- walking dogs, walking with a beverage,etc -- otherwise I'd give it five stars all the way. Get one!!!
customer_reviews.author: NoraNoron

customer_reviews.title: Works great but too bad no carrying strap while the inside is wet
customer_reviews.text: Had it about a month and so far I really like it. It opens and closes well, the colors are very pretty and I love not getting drenched when getting in my car while it's raining! I only gave 4 stars though because it would have been nice if the Velcro closing stamp could double as a carrying strap while the inside is wet and you have to hold it upright to prevent the water spilling out. Overall great product and I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Morwen Ilse

customer_reviews.title: I now have three of these umbrellas
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, don't have to worry about it collapsing in heavy rains and wind..easy to open up and I've stayed a lot drier since it inverts.
customer_reviews.author: Connie E Goff

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color.
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella it self is a umbrella. The reason for the low star is because when I purchase this item I had choose the American Flag but when I received it it’s black. Nothing wrong with that color if I didn’t already have one. I only wanted it because it was the American
customer_reviews.author: billie Jo

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, but broke after 2 uses :(
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, beautiful umbrella, but, after 2nd use it won't stay open anymore, it collapses on my head, which is frustrating and useless in a rainstorm...for the price paid, very upsetting, especially because I bought 3, one for me and 2 for gifts, hoping the recipients are satisfied/not experiencing same issue. Past the return window, as the 2nd use was way after the return date. So I have a pretty umbrella that cost a lot and I cant use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this umbrella! It is easy to use, and keeps my car seat from getting wet once I fold it and put it in my passenger seat. I have used the C handle a few times, when trying to carry multiple items, and while it helps sometimes, it’s sometimes will fall to the side. Overall, this is an amazing umbrella, and I definitely will purchase these from now on, rather then buying a traditional one.
customer_reviews.author: DianaS

customer_reviews.title: Broke very fast
customer_reviews.text: It broke two weeks after I re eive it. Very disappointing. I really wanted to like this umbrella
customer_reviews.author: HelisaAU

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: I received the item it was packed nicely! & arrived early! Everything looked good until we got rain, I tried using my new umbrella and found it to be defective, the lock catch that holds the umbrella open didn’t work I got soaked! Called Amazon the next day and was told to call Bagail, I left a message over a month ago NO ONE has returned my call... I just wanted a working umbrella not a refund!!
customer_reviews.author: China

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and cool inverted design but cheaply made and fell apart in a week!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a beautiful umbrella easy to hold and operate. However after one week of use, it broke. Literally came apart in my hands. The top came apart from the rod that holds it up. I was not in really heavy wind at all. It was raining the two different times I used it, average rain. Very disappointed, very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani

customer_reviews.title: Quick and Easy Service
customer_reviews.text: I bought this umbrella back in March, I loved the idea of it. It was great but some how the umbrella stopped closing and believe it or not they have a 1 yr warranty on the umbrella. I was so happy when I reached out to them and was able to get a new umbrella without any hassle. I would definitely recommend this product and bought an extra one as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: BAD PRODUCT!! NO GOOD!!WANT MY MONEY BACK
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2. One was sent as gift one was sent to me. Beautiful umbrellas but NO GOOD. Just decided to use umbrella as it is now raining and it fell apart. The gift that I sent also complaint that umbrella is beautiful but NO GOOD. Had the same problem. See for yourself. Very embarrassed about the gift BAD PRODUCT!! NO GOOD!!!
customer_reviews.author: St.Hellen E Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I thought, but works great!
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting an umbrella small enough to put in my daughter's bookbag - this is not the one! It's pretty large. But we will be keeping and using it; it's convenient to open and close, sturdy and offers great protection from both rain and sun.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Like it. Great color selection
customer_reviews.text: I really like this. I had another umbrella similar to this and it started coming apart at the ends after just a few uses. Despite my experience I tried another brand because I like the idea of the umbrella and so far so good. Holding up and doing its job.
customer_reviews.author: EHMomma

customer_reviews.title: does its job
customer_reviews.text: I like this umbrella enough. I bought a couple as gifts as well. You do have to be careful and make sure you don't trap water in it when closing it and placing in your car. Also, sometimes I have to push it up kind of hard to keep it open. Other than that, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: ijs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: So pretty! I want one to match every outfit! My job requires me to work outside, in all kinds of weather, carrying a tablet. I love that I can put my arm through the handle of this umbrella and still have my hand free to hold my laptop!
customer_reviews.author: TechnoGrammie

customer_reviews.title: Solid umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and now I want one too. It's very well made. It's for 2 layers of material to block out rain and sun. The designs are lovely. These umbrellas make great Christmas presents for that person that's got you stumped
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This sure makes getting in and out of a car easier in the rain, no more water getting on you like normal umbrellas. Haven't had an big winds yet so don't know how it will perform, but expect it will do at least as well as regular ones do. Get ready to answer "where did you get that!" questions, I get them every time I pull this out.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Favorite umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I love my new umbrella! I expect it to hold up much longer than the cheapo $5 ones I’ve been buying that break right away. I love the design of the handle & how easily I can hang it anything. When in use I can even hang a grocery bag or my purse on it as well. I especially love being able to stand it up after closing it so it can drip dry, so convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First one broke on the first day of use, It's replacement broke on the third.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the style and aesthetic of this umbrella. Unfortunately, it's internal structure isn't great. On my way into work, I opened the umbrella for sun protection and something snapped inside of the canopy layers and stabbed through the rainbow side tearing a two-inch long hole in the bottom. The replacement did the same thing. The umbrella is still functional but it has definitely lost some of its sturdiness against the wind. Knowing what I know now I would not have purchased this umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Crane

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: I have been wanting this type of umbrella for a while. I usually hate toting an umbrella because once you fold it down you get all wet anyways so why bother. This type is much different and I find myself using it more often.
customer_reviews.author: Atrila

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: One star because it is very flimsy and doesn’t hold open well at all. The coating on the handle start chipping off the handle. Not worth the money. Haven’t had to chance to use in rain and probably wouldn’t trust it, honestly. I also got a different design than I selected.... Unfortunately, I missed the return window, otherwise I’d return for a refund. Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: STZ

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, hope it lasts!
customer_reviews.text: The umbrella looks great, seems sturdy and i like the design. Some of these styles had poor reviews, but this company seems like it makes a good product, so I hope this will last a long time. I plan to buy some of these for gifts - they are very attractive! The design I like was even less expensive than some of the others, a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: libraryphil

customer_reviews.title: This was a lifesaver for me....
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a fenced yard, so when we have bad rain or thunderstorms, I still have to take my dog out to potty. This opens fast, I can hold it with one hand easily, and most importantly, it closes fast and drains from the inside. I would definitely recommend this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Calypso

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it's worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this umbrella. However, it has only lasted a year before the problems started. The fabric started slipping off the tips. Then the handle came a loose from frame. As much as I love it, can't spend the money each year.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Couts

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I really like this umbrella. It is wide enough that no rain get in under it. Love that it opens with just a push of the button. Handle is comfortable, like that it can hang on my wrist if needed with out falling off. Light weight. It does stand on it own, so you can sit where you want to dry. I can get in and out of my car without get the inside of the door wet. Have used it on a windy day yet, but the way it is made i think the wind will not effect it.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Virtue

customer_reviews.title: This umbrella held up even when the wind was blowing hard!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this umbrella & noticed that it held up under high wind when other's umbrellas were turning inside out!! Also, easy to open & close which I've had much difficulty with other umbrellas, & it doesn't get you or your seat wet when you get in the car. Finally, 'enjoy the beautiful design on the inside once you open it. (I got the beautiful yellow flower.)
customer_reviews.author: Doris Rissler

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this umbrella based on positive reviews. It is a pretty umbrella with a sunflower on it. I've used it a few times and it seems to be sturdy and well made. It is reverse folding which seems to make sense. I recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Intuitive operation
customer_reviews.text: I can't review this product on my own behalf, since I bought it as a birthday gift for a friend. But she was very pleased to receive it and will be glad to discard her old, traditional umbrella in favor of this one! It confused her a bit at first (she's not used to seeing this design) but she quickly figured out how it operates. She's pretty impressed so far.
customer_reviews.author: EmClaire

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Sunflowers are my favorite flower. This was the best umbrella and I always received comments on the uniqueness of it. I loved it... until it stopped working! Pushing the button on the handle and then raising the umbrella to where it should catch to stay open...and then it didn't. Had to lower and raise quite a few times in order to get it to catch. Very sad. I loved my new umbrella! Back to my old, plain umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Luckyldy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it from peer pressure from others who have it and say it’s better than standard umbrellas. So I bought the umbrella. I have yet to use the umbrella, but look forward to it. It looks pretty wrapped in plastic and ready to be put to good use!
customer_reviews.author: PandaBear2Hug

customer_reviews.title: ANOTHER ITEM FROM CHINA, PEOPLE
customer_reviews.text: THIS UMBRELLA IS YET ONE MORE AMAZON ITEM FROM CHINA...HEY JEFF WHY NOT REALLY GIVE THANKS TO THE USA - THE COUNTRY YOU SAID YOU LOVED WHEN YOU TESTIFIED BEFORE THAT CONGRESSIONAL COMMITTEE - BY SELLING ALL AMERICAN PRODUCTS??? JUST A PATRIOTIC SUGGESTION. HAD I KNOWN THIS WAS ANOTHER ITEM FROM CHINA, I WOULD NOT HAVE PURCHASED IT.
customer_reviews.author: hrbdoctr

customer_reviews.title: No Wet Hair
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my wife. She loves it. She gets her hair done every week. Umbrella protects it but the trick of getting into the car and closing the umbrella is difficult but this umbrella makes it easy. It has a great handle and those two different colors of fabric make it a conversation piece.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Ross

customer_reviews.title: Failed mechanism after several months use
customer_reviews.text: I would have originally given this product a 5 star rating - not anymore! I purchased three of these umbrellas, and recently the locking mechanisms on two failed so now the umbrellas will not stay open. Also, the umbrella has a year warranty, but after 2 months of correspondences I have been unsuccessful so far in getting the company to replace this umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Glotfelter

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and won't break in the wind
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I didn't like was the size... it would be nice if it was wider. I bought this as a gift for a friend, not having a clue what she would like. She loved it! Her niece wanted it and tried to get her to swap with her. She wasn't about to swap.
customer_reviews.author: Big Ox

customer_reviews.title: Everything about this umbrella is great..
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this umbrella is great...style, price, function....I recommend highly. I am so tempted to buy another one just because they are so beautiful and functional. Works just like it says.. With all the rain in Tennessee I have used a lot and it is cool!! Would recommend and buy again!
customer_reviews.author: tll413

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first use!
customer_reviews.text: I Bought this umbrella in July, used it for the first time in September, the main pole snapped in half. It is not repairable. I can not return it due to having it for so long and not needing to use it until today.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Practical to take on public transit without risking getting other ...
customer_reviews.text: Practical to take on public transit without risking getting other people wet. Already slightly busted after a few months of gentle use, so not exactly a high quality item.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.text: Love this umbrella. A friend of mine had one that she’s used for years so when my last umbrella broke, I followed her suggestion and bought one. I couldn’t be happier with it. It’s big enough to prevent any part of me getting rained on, and the handle makes it so easy to carry around with hands full. I know others have complained about the vents on the bottom layer, but it seems like the two layers wouldn’t be able to expand towards/away from each other without them. I got the yellow flower and it’s delightful.
customer_reviews.author: Addie McGuire

customer_reviews.title: I did good with this gift!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as birthday present for my wife. Haven't used it yet (will use today-it's been steady-pouring for past 24 hours on east coast). Very pretty and unique design with up-side folding instead of normal down-side folding. Wife ike it and the floral design on the inside of the umbrella is very pretty and bold. I did good with this gift!
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Mine was flimsy
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used it I opened it in a gentle rain in my driveway, then closed it. Immediately I discovered one of the plastic rib tips was broken, separating the inner and outer layers at that point. Returned via Kohl's.
customer_reviews.author: bruno

customer_reviews.title: Cool umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: Cloud print on the underside of the umbrella is too cute. Well made, great protection. Only down side is its full size (not compact). Definitely worth the money. My college-aged daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: momto4sweeties

customer_reviews.title: It won't stay open
customer_reviews.text: UPD. I got another umbrella from the seller. Works great. Umbrella looks pretty well made. But the latch broke few months after I bought the product. The umbrella won't stay open, it folds on it's own. I have two more same kind of umbrellas from other sellers and I don't have such a problem with others. Very disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana

customer_reviews.title: great purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love this umbrella!! I've wanted one of these for a long time and they had a great sale on them! I love the color and look of it!! We bought them for multiple cars as a result! It was great!
customer_reviews.author: Aysenu

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product to keep from getting wet
customer_reviews.text: I love the ease of putting up and taking down this umbrella. The flower design on the inside of the umbrella is unlike any other umbrella I have owned. The size seems to provide more protection than an ordinary umbrella. I am very satisfied with your product and would recommend this umbrella to others.
customer_reviews.author: Sue K

customer_reviews.title: Quality, colorful, functional & fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as gifts for two friends who must lug stuff from car to house. Both raved about the functionality. One said even her husband was impressed. We’ve had a wet fall and winter, so I bought one for myself. Terrific when getting in and out of car and unloading stuff.
customer_reviews.author: L. Brannel

customer_reviews.title: Good product, Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: I love the design of the umbrella it's beautiful and easier to walk around with as opposed to a straight handle umbrella. It handles the wind well and reverse close is great. I had one issue with the umbrella not latching properly but I contacted the seller and within hours the issue was resolved, so good customer service as well. I would recommend, hopefully they make a smaller C handle version that can fit in your bag.
customer_reviews.author: Louran24

product_meta.title: BAGAIL Double Layer Inverted Umbrella Reverse Folding Umbrellas Windproof UV Protection Big Straight Umbrella for Car Rain Outdoor with C-Shaped Handle
feature_bullets: UV Protection: Made with Double Layer Anti-Ultraviolet(UPF>50) Pongee Fabric,Bagail Inverted Umbrella is Featured with "0" Light Transmittance to Prevent UV Radiation from Damaging Your Skin.

Hands&Drip free:Great for phone user and mothers, Cross the C-shape handle over your arm, made you hands free for holding a baby, bag or mobile if needed.Creative investing design, inside-out design prevents water from dripping, keeping floors and cars dry.
INVERTED DESIGN - The surface of the umbrella cloth wet will cleverly folded. So it won't get wet when you get in or out of the car.
Durable Windproof:The double layer inverted umbrella made of pongee cloth, durable black electric ribs and double layer ribs make the cars umbrella more sturdy, enhance its windproof effect

(WORRY_FREE ONE YEAR WARRANTY)Easy To Storage: It can stand up on its own, ideal for when you have nowhere to prop your umbrella up against. It will also keep the wet part of the umbrella inside once you've closed it, so things don't get dripped on when you put it away after coming indoors
